gems.name: openai-term
gems.info: A modern terminal interface to OpenAI with a full TUI using rcurses. Features include interactive chat mode, conversation history, model selection, and more. Version 3.0.2: Complete fix for ruby-openai 3.7.0 compatibility - using 'ruby/openai' for backward compatibility, fixed Rcurses::Pane and Rcurses::Cursor references, added missing io/console requirement, improved configuration help.
